artifact.content: Administrator can log into the System Console
Ability to add new users to the system.
Allow administrator to find unassigned phone number.
Allow administrator to find available IP address
Mechanism to associate an IP address to a phone number.
Allow administrator to associate privileges to a user
Users should be able to apply filters to their phone calls.
Administrator must be able to associate a user to a phone number and IP
Mechanism to dissociate an IP address from a phone number.
Mechanism to dissociate an IP address and phone number from a user.
Deactivate the user�s telephone service
The user�s records should be kept indefinitely.
Server must store results of previous tests run.
The administrator may request hardware tests.
The administrator may request to see the results of the most recently run tests
System must be able to calculate and give a recommendation on the load size
Allow the administrator to set the load size
Display the current maximum load size
Display the current load of the system.
Allows administrator to search for a user
The results of the search is displayed to the administrator
The server must be able to conduct automated tests periodically.
If a phone is unresponsive, system resources are released.
When a phone is corrected, then resources are reassigned to it.
The System Console must have a Graphical User Interface
Administrator must be able to view a user�s bill for any billing period
Administrator must be able to record a user�s payment and deduct it from their account
Administrator should be able to add new billing plans
Administrator should be able to add modify existing billing plans
Administrator should be able to attach billing plan to user
Administrator should be able to suspend a user�s account
Administrator should be able to reactivate a user�s account
At the end of each billing period, the system must generate and send a bill to each user
User should be able to place phone calls
User should be able to receive phone calls.
User should be able to terminate phone calls.
The server must store important information about each successful call.
The server checks that the requested number is available for use.
The administrator can print a user�s bill.
Administrator should be able to remove existing billing plans.
Administrator should be able to view the list of administrators.
Administrator should be able to change the password to his/her account.
Administrator should be able to create administrator accounts.
Administrator should be able to delete administrator accounts.
Administrator should be able to save resources.
Administrator should be able to restore resources.
Only one administrator can log in at a time
Administrator must provide a valid user name and password
A phone malfunction must not affect the system as a whole.
An administrator can only save valid input
User Manuals will be provided for all aspects of the system
The system should be able to handle as many users as there are phone numbers
The system console load time should be brief
The system load will be large enough to handle the phone traffic
